name: Call Number Match Query
description: Query to find instances with matching call number
query: WITH call_number AS (SELECT ie.instance_hrid, he.call_number_type_id, he.call_number_type_name, he.call_number, TRIM(CONCAT_WS(' ', he.call_number_prefix, he.call_number, he.call_number_suffix)) AS full_call_number, ie.title, sm.content AS author FROM folio_derived.instance_ext ie JOIN folio_derived.holdings_ext he ON ie.instance_id = he.instance_id JOIN folio_source_record.marc__t sm ON ie.instance_hrid = sm.instance_hrid WHERE he.call_number IS NOT NULL AND he.call_number !~ '^\s*$' AND he.call_number_type_id IS NOT NULL AND sm.field = '100' AND sm.ord = 1 AND sm.sf = 'a') SELECT l.instance_hrid AS hrid, r.instance_hrid AS hrid2, l.call_number AS call_number, r.call_number AS call_number2, l.full_call_number, '"' || REPLACE(l.title, '"', '""') || '"' AS title, '"' || REPLACE(r.title, '"', '""') || '"' AS title2, '"' || REPLACE(l.author, '"', '""') || '"' AS author, '"' || REPLACE(r.author, '"', '""') || '"' AS author2 FROM call_number l JOIN call_number r ON l.full_call_number = r.full_call_number AND l.instance_hrid < r.instance_hrid
